description:
apa is visited by two of his underclassmen. The first one can’t seem to stop paying for microtransactions and the second needs ideas for a new game featuring anthropomorphic characters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kakin!! Tensai Bakabon / Gijinka Suru no Da
Microtransactions!! Late Night! The Genius Bakabon / Anthropomorphize It
課金!! 天才バカボン / 擬人化するのだ
